meanings.definition: The practice of being a cicisbeo.
meanings.sent1: Her cicisbeisms involved accompanying the lady to social events.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends admired his cicisbeisms towards the noblewoman.
meanings.sent3: His dedication to cicisbeisms sometimes made him late for work.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cicisbeisms, loyalty is highly valued.
meanings.sent5: The art of cicisbeisms requires finesse and discretion.

meanings.definition: The behavior or characteristics of a cicisbeo.
meanings.sent1: The elegance in his cicisbeisms was admired by all.
meanings.sent2: She studied the intricate cicisbeisms of the courtier.
meanings.sent3: His exaggerated cicisbeisms always brought a smile to people's faces.
meanings.sent4: Her cicisbeisms shone brightly in the royal court.
meanings.sent5: The essence of his cicisbeisms was captured in the painting.
